addonDesc.message: Kopi url fa'amau e fai ma hyperlinks po'o fa'amatalaga manino

cpyalllnk.message: Tapa uma e fai ma So'oga

cpyalltxt.message: Tape uma e pei o URL o Tusitusiga

cpysellnk.message: Tapa Filifilia e fai ma So'oga

cpyseltxt.message: Pepa Filifilia e avea ma URL o Tusitusiga

cpytabtxt.message: Lenei Tab e pei o Tusitusiga URL

cpytablnk.message: Lenei Tab e fai ma So'oga

cpyalllnknp.message: Tapa uma e fai ma So'oga (✂️)

cpyalltxtnp.message: Tape uma e pei o URL o Tusitusiga (✂️)

cpysellnknp.message: Tapa Filifilia e fai ma So'oga (✂️)

cpyseltxtnp.message: Pepa Filifilia e avea ma URL o Tusitusiga (✂️)

cpytabtxtnp.message: Lenei Tab e pei o Tusitusiga URL (✂️)

cpytablnknp.message: Lenei Tab e fai ma So'oga (✂️)

tip1.message: The active tab is always selected

tip2.message: Use the CTRL key to select additional tabs

tip3.message: Use the SHIFT key to select a range of tabs

tip4.message: All copy actions can be assigned to hotkeys/shortcuts

tip5.message: All copy actions are also available via the tab context menu

tip6.message: LMB and MMB action of the toolbar button can be switched

tip7.message: Use MMB/LMB to immediately invoke a copy action

tip8.message: Change the immediate copy action via the toolbar buttons context menu

tip9.message: Give the developers feedback so they'll know what is good and what needs impovement
